vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, only mentioned at Gen.36.22;
son of: Lotan (H3877);
brother of: Hori (H2753H)
Also named: he.mam (הֵימָם "Hemam" H1967)
§ Homam = "confusion"
a descendant of Seir the Horite, the son of Lotan
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Lotán; descendiente de Seír
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
荷幔 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "困惑"
1) 何利人西珥的後裔, 羅坍的兒子 (代上1:39)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
荷幔 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "困惑"
1) 何利人西珥的后裔, 罗坍的儿子 (代上1:39)
